short_summary: Purchasing chairs for hybrid return to office (RTO) at Carling Campus.
description: Procure 55 office chairs to be used by HR-CIV employees at Carling Campus.
full_summary:
### Office Chairs for Hybrid Return to Office (RTO) at Carling Campus

**Notice Type**
This is a request for proposals (RFP) in response to a supply arrangement.

**Procurement Method**
This is an open bidding process.

**Scope of Work**
The Department of National Defence requires the purchase of 55 office chairs for Hybrid Return to Office (RTO) at Carling Campus, Building 3, 1st Floor. The chairs will be used by Human Resources-Civil (HR-CIV) employees.

**Requirements**

* 55 office chairs to be assembled and delivered to the collaborative space on the 1st floor of building 3.
* Chairs must meet the requirements specified in the attached document, **Chair Builder**.
* Delivery from the loading dock to each cubicle within the office space must be completed.
* Escort service will be provided.

**Location of Work**
60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario
Service Business Center – Building 2 (Loading Dock)
Transfer from Loading Dock to Building 3 – 1st floor – Collaborative Space.

**Schedule of Work**
Chairs must be delivered during a business day, between 8:00 am and 3:00 pm.

**Contract Deliverables**
All deliverables must be received by February 9, 2024, COB.

**Participation Requirements**
To participate in this RFP, please refer to the attached documents:
* [Furniture ADM(HR-CIV) RFP MC Competitive Eng](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22585/Furniture_adm-(hr-civ_rfp_mc_competitive_en.pdf)
* [SOW-CHAIRS](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22585/SOW_chair-builder.pdf)

**Important Dates**

* Tender closing: November 24, 2023, at 2:00 pm
* Expected contract start date: November 15, 2023
* Expected contract end date: February 9, 2024

**For More Information**
For additional information, please contact:
Trina Gaumond
Phone: 418 809-8827
Email: [trina.gaumond2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:trina.gaumond2@forces.gc.ca)
Address: 25 Grand Bernier South, Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, QC
